channel.title: Adding a custom Quest (pi)
channel.description:
Hi, i am wondering how to make a custom quest..
im trying to make a dontor only quest and when they complete they can use a korasi's sword..
so how would i make a custom quest and how to make korasi useable if u finsh the quest??
Thanks (:

item.title: Adding a custom Quest (pi)
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“charliebyrd1997, post:1, topic:432000”]Hi, i am wondering how to make a custom quest…

im trying to make a dontor only quest and when they complete they can use a korasi’s sword…

so how would i make a custom quest and how to make korasi useable if u finsh the quest??

Thanks (:[/quote]
In the tutorial section is a topic about quests. You should take a look at that and it will give a clear view on how to make quests.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a custom Quest (pi)
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Firstly you would need to make a character token in playersave.java

then make the quest and every time a stage is completed make the token increase by 1

then after the final stage of the quest is complete (example questName = 15)
in your wield method add something like

if (itemID == KORASI-ID) && (p.questName == 15) { // equip method here } else { c.sendMessage("You need to have completed questName to use a korasi's sword"); }

The above code will not work it is just for example purposes do not expect me to spoonfeed you.

Read full topic
